concepts.term: If your input signal isn't made of sinusoids, or your system doesn't treat them nicely, this property breaks down.

evidence: It means the system doesn’t generate any new frequencies. It doesn’t distort the sinusoid into some other shape. It simply scales it or shifts its phase - but the frequency stays the same.
Convolution in time equals multiplication in frequency.
